attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Lloyd has failed miserably to asist me in a number of basic issues. He simply 'passes the buck', does not even answer correspondence and has passed on his nil communications skills to his councillors in Clayton who in turn do nothing for their remuneration.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. We suggest you contact the relevant political party.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
